name: coastal-threat-alert-system
description: Coastal Threat Alert System - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-backend: test -d backend && cd backend && npm install || echo 'Backend directory not found'
scripts.install-ai: test -d ai-models && cd ai-models && pip install -r requirements.txt || echo 'AI models directory not found'
scripts.start-backend: test -d backend && cd backend && node server.js || echo 'Backend directory not found'
scripts.start-ai: test -d ai-models && cd ai-models && uvicorn api.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 || echo 'AI models directory not found'

author: HEETMEHTA18
